title: test: test_rocks_titan_basic_ops timeouts
body:
## Bug Report

`test_rocks_titan_basic_ops` uses `proptest` to compare the behavirs of RocksDB and TitanDB. The test timouts which means it takes to long to run the test or there's a deadlock issue.

![image](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/assets/71589810/e0cd158e-78ef-477c-bbfc-be6fa0380eb8)
